body_html:
Thanks for your answer, this is working, the size does not increase when resetting the graph each time.
But we get a new graph and we lose the trained weights.
Can't we get the latest version of the graph exported each time without having the size of the .pb file explodes?
body_text:
Thanks for your answer, this is working, the size does not increase when resetting the graph each time.
But we get a new graph and we lose the trained weights.
Can't we get the latest version of the graph exported each time without having the size of the .pb file explodes?
body:
Thanks for your answer, this is working, the size does not increase when resetting the graph each time. 
But we get a new graph and we **lose the trained weights**. 
Can't we get the latest version of the graph exported each time without having the size of the .pb file explodes?
